entities.name: harry

entities.name: krum
entities.description: A Quidditch player who is trying to rescue Hermione.

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: fleur

entities.name: ron

relationships.description: Harry and Krum are working together to rescue Hermione.
Harry is worried about Hermione's safety.
Krum is rescuing Hermione from the underwater cave.
Harry expects Fleur to arrive and help with the rescue.
